MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the L26 and WA8 postcode areas of Liverpool and Prescot , affecting properties in  Halewood Park , Ash Lane and surrounding areas. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of ongoing investigation and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4:30 PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1:04 PM on 4th December 2020.
